document_data.mainbody:
eenab was a vizier in the service of Amakim ibn Issad in Zakhara during the 5th century DR.
Zeenab, according to Azaltin ibn Issads account of the history of Al-Anwahr in The Kingdom of Lions, was able to sway Amakim to do what he wished. Azaltin believed that Zeenab convinced his brother that he had become some kind of undead monster, launching a brief civil war that would result in the destruction of much of the city.
